articles.title: Lava Blaze 2 debuts in India with 5,000mAh battery at Rs 8,999 - Kalinga TV
articles.description: Lava has introduced another budget-friendly smartphone in India named -'Blaze 2'. The entry-level Lava Blaze 2 is priced at Rs 8,999. It has a premium glass finish and is equipped with a 5,000mAh battery and a massive 6.5 inch punch-hole display.Lava
